content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees are dismissed via Exit Requests functionality in UPSA and in accordance with the local legislation and a mutual agreement between the employee and the company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study information in article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/EDK4Fg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Exit request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn more about this process.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
